title: Font ID please...
content:
I’m interested in the font used in the top-level menu buttons here:  
  [http://www.brio.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212003/http:/www.brio.net/ "http://www.brio.net/")

I can’t find it out :-(

Thanx for your kind help :-)

 [‹ movie theater signage?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212003/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45586 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please ID this script font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212003/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45591 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Luca Vinci

comments.content:
Looks like Arial to me.

The other text looks like Myriad.

This ought to be in the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212003/http:/typophile.com/forum/29)
